Event.Message: Your computer has lost the lease to its IP address %1 on the Network Card with network address %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Address" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> <data name="HWLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="HWAddress" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="HWLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: Your computer was not assigned an address from the network (by the DHCP Server) for the Network Card with network address %2. The following error occurred: %3. Your computer will continue to try and obtain an address on its own from the network address (DHCP) server.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HWLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="HWAddress" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="HWLength"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: The IP address lease %1 for the Network Card with network address %3 has been denied by the DHCP server %4 (The DHCP Server sent a DHCPNACK message).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Address1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> <data name="HWLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="HWAddress" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="HWLength"/> <data name="Address2" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> </template>

Event.Message: Your computer was not able to renew its address from the network (from the DHCP Server) for the Network Card with network address %2. The following error occurred: %3. Your computer will continue to try and obtain an address on its own from the network address (DHCP) server.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HWLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="HWAddress" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="HWLength"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Error occurred in stopping the Dhcpv4 Client service. Error code is %1. ShutDown Flag value is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> <data name="DwordVal" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Your computer has detected that the IP address %1 for the Network Card with network address %3 is already in use on the network. Your computer will automatically attempt to obtain a different address.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Address" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> <data name="HWLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="HWAddress" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="HWLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: Your computer was unable to automatically configure the IP parameters for the Network Card with the network address %2. The following error occurred during configuration: %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HWLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="HWAddress" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="HWLength"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Your computer has automatically configured the IP address for the Network Card with network address %2. The IP address being used is %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HWLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="HWAddress" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="HWLength"/> <data name="Address" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> </template>

Event.Message: Your computer was unable to initialize a Network Interface attached to the system. The error code is: %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Dhcpv6 Initialization has failed on the computer with the error code %1. Dhcp service will start with IPv4 only.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Media Connect notification received with Interface Id %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Media Disconnect notification received with Interface Id %1

Event.Message: Dhcp is enabled on the adapter with Interface Id %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Discover is sent from the adapter %1.Status code is %2

Event.Message: Offer is accepted in the adapter %1.Offered Address is %2.Server address is %3

Event.Message: Offer is discarded in the adapter %1. Error code is %2

Event.Message: Request is sent from the adapter %1. Status code is %2

Event.Message: Ack is accepted in the adapter %1. Received Address is %2.Server address is %3

Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Unknown message is discarded in the adapter %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Decline is sent in the adapter %1. Status code is %2

Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Broadcast bit is toggled in the adapter %1. Broadcast bit after toggling is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="BoolFlag" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> </template>

Event.Message: Error occurred in extracting the options in the adapter %1. Status code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Address" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> </template>

DHCPv4 client service is stopped. ShutDown Flag value is %1

Event.Message: An error occurred in initializing DHCPv4. Error Code is %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: An error has occurred in closing the socket in the adapter %1. Error Code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: A network error occurred when trying to send a message. The error code is: %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Gateway is reachable in the adapter %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Gateway is not reachable in the adapter %1

Event.Message: Your computer was successfully assigned an address from the network, and it can now connect to other computers.

Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Str1" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Str2" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Str3" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Str4" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Route is deleted with the values Dest = %1, DestMask = %2, NextHop = %3, Address = %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Str1" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Str2" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Str3" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Str4" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Address" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Address" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: PERFTRACK (Request-Ack): Address confirmed for the adapter %2.Confirmed Address is %3.Server address is %4

Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Address1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> <data name="Address2" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> </template>

Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: PERFTRACK: DHCP not enabled in the adapter %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Address1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> <data name="Address2" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> </template>

Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Address1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> <data name="Address2" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> </template>

Event.Message: PERFTRACK (Request-Ack): Address confirmed for the adapter %2.Confirmed Address is %3.Server address is %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Address1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> <data name="Address2" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> </template>

Event.Message: PERFTRACK (DORA): Offer is accepted in the adapter %2.Offered Address is %3.Server address is %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Address1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> <data name="Address2" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> </template>

Event.Message: PERFTRACK: Setting up Fallback configuration in the adapter %2. Status code is %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: PERFTRACK (Request-Ack): Address confirmed for the adapter %2 after toggling the broadcast bit in INIT-REBOOT. Confirmed address is %3. Server address is %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Address1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> <data name="Address2" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> </template>

Event.Message: PERFTRACK (Request-Nack-Dora): Offer is accepted in the adapter %2 after toggling the broadcast bit in INIT-REBOOT. Offered Address is %3. Server address is %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Address1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> <data name="Address2" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> </template>

Event.Message: PERFTRACK (Init-Dora): Offer is accepted in the adapter %2 after toggling the broadcast bit in INIT. Offered Address is %3. Server address is %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Address1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> <data name="Address2" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> </template>

Event.Message: PERFTRACK (DHCPv4): Media Connect on adapter %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: PERFTRACK (DHCPv4): End of Media Connect on adapter %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: PERFTRACK (Media Reconnect): Media reconnect notification was received on adapter %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>
